title: 旧约 - 耶利米哀歌(Lamentations) - 第 5 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 耶利米哀歌(Lamentations) -- 第 5 章 ( 本篇共有 5 章 )

lineList.en: Remember, O LORD, what is come upon us: consider, and behold our reproach.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你记念我们所遭遇的事，观看我们所受的凌辱。

lineList.en: Our inheritance is turned to strangers, our houses to aliens.
lineList.cn: 我们的产业归与外邦人。我们的房屋归与外路人。

lineList.en: We are orphans and fatherless, our mothers are as widows.
lineList.cn: 我们是无父的孤儿。我们的母亲好像寡妇。

lineList.en: We have drunken our water for money; our wood is sold unto us.
lineList.cn: 我们出钱才得水喝。我们的柴是人卖给我们的。

lineList.en: Our necks are under persecution: we labour, and have no rest.
lineList.cn: 追赶我们的，到了我们的颈项上。我们疲乏不得歇息。

lineList.en: We have given the hand to the Egyptians, and to the Assyrians, to be satisfied with bread.
lineList.cn: 我们投降埃及人和亚述人，为要得粮吃饱。

lineList.en: Our fathers have sinned, and are not; and we have borne their iniquities.
lineList.cn: 我们列祖犯罪，而今不在了。我们担当他们的罪孽。

lineList.en: Servants have ruled over us: there is none that doth deliver us out of their hand.
lineList.cn: 奴仆辖制我们，无人救我们脱离他们的手。

lineList.en: We gat our bread with the peril of our lives because of the sword of the wilderness.
lineList.cn: 因为旷野的刀剑，我们冒着险才得粮食。

lineList.en: Our skin was black like an oven because of the terrible famine.
lineList.cn: 因饥饿燥热，我们的皮肤就黑如炉。

lineList.en: They ravished the women in Zion, and the maids in the cities of Judah.
lineList.cn: 敌人在锡安玷污妇人，在犹大的城邑玷污处女。

lineList.en: Princes are hanged up by their hand: the faces of elders were not honoured.
lineList.cn: 他们吊起首领的手，也不尊敬老人的面。

lineList.en: They took the young men to grind, and the children fell under the wood.
lineList.cn: 少年人扛磨石，孩童背木柴，都绊跌了。

lineList.en: The elders have ceased from the gate, the young men from their musick.
lineList.cn: 老年人在城门口断绝。少年人不再作乐。

lineList.en: The joy of our heart is ceased; our dance is turned into mourning.
lineList.cn: 我们心中的快乐止息，跳舞变为悲哀。

lineList.en: The crown is fallen from our head: woe unto us, that we have sinned!
lineList.cn: 冠冕从我们的头上落下。我们犯罪了，我们有祸了。

lineList.en: For this our heart is faint; for these things our eyes are dim.
lineList.cn: 这些事我们心里发昏，我们的眼睛昏花。

lineList.en: Because of the mountain of Zion, which is desolate, the foxes walk upon it.
lineList.cn: 锡安山荒凉，野狗（或作狐狸）行在其上。

lineList.en: Thou, O LORD, remainest for ever; thy throne from generation to generation.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，你存到永远。你的宝座存到万代。

lineList.en: Wherefore dost thou forget us for ever, and forsake us so long time?
lineList.cn: 你为何永远忘记我们。为何许久离弃我们。

lineList.en: Turn thou us unto thee, O LORD, and we shall be turned; renew our days as of old.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，求你使我们向你回转，我们便得回转。求你复新我们的日子，像古时一样。

lineList.en: But thou hast utterly rejected us; thou art very wroth against us.
lineList.cn: 你竟全然弃绝我们，向我们大发烈怒。
